name: 3D Pocket Classic Bowling
description:
Head to the your local bowling alley and polish your bowling skills in this awesome game!

Hit all the pins to score a strike! Try to score three strikes in the last round to maximize your score!

In this game, you must adjust your position, time your speed, and time your angle properly to hit all the pins and bring them down.

Strikes gain bonus points so be sure to get as many strikes as you can. Just like in real bowling, If you manage to get a strike on the last round, you’ll have an additional round for a maximum of 2 additional rounds!

Have fun!
